item.description: Slammer's Island Birthday Bash at Season's 19 Circuit Av in Oak Bluffs, MA Martha's Vineyard. Sox/Braves game amongst others will be on the many big screen tvs, and most of all it's Karaoke night! No cover and everyone pays their own way. Food served until 10pm. No re-entry after 1230am. Last call at 1245am. Karaoke ends at 1am. Everyone out of building by 120am. Last bus 110am. www.seasonspub.com www.steamshipauthority.com www.nashuahouse.com 1 block from Season's. Rates as low as $69 per night.
item.name: Slammer's Island Birthday Bash
